Mod2_Description: {c_important}Lacerate's{/c} initial strike is guaranteed to Critically Strike and deals {c_number}[{SF_15}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage.
Mod1_Description: Each time {c_important}Lacerate{/c} deals a Critical Strike, Heal for {c_number}[{SF_14}*100|%|]{/c} Maximum Life {c_number}([PlayerHealthMax() * SF_14]){/c}.
name: Lacerate
